comment: Could not seem to sign into app

title: Easy to report faults, pants trying to view others
comment: If you want to report a fault quickly, great. Log in, locate yourself, report. Job done. However, try to view other faults locally and it all falls apart. On opening the app you can view the map, select a fault and view it. There it ends. You can't go back to the map and select another. The map view doesn't appear in the menu. The back button doesn't work. Oh, and you can't exit - you have to minims then kill in your app manager. Shame. So much potential.

title: Back Button?
comment: Why doesn't the back button work? This is ridiculous. As I have no intention of using this, otherwise good app, I shall be uninstaling it.
Good app that helps me report problems in my area to my local council.
Great idea but terrible UI. "Show name publicly" checkbox doesn't work on HTC M9.
Easy way to report problems

title: Fantastic Ap!
comment: Reported Graffiti 2 days later removed !
Excellent, This is one of the best App's I have.

title: Easy to report problems to councils
comment: FixMyStreet is easy to use. It asks you where the problem is, to select a type of problem, then to describe it, offering the choice of submitting a photo too. Based on the type and location, it works out which is the right council to send it to. I use it mostly to report graffiti, flyposting, flytipping, and missed bin collections in my local area - I use FillThatHole to report potholes and road defects.

title: EPIC TRY IT
comment: It is cool  being nosy what's happening in my street there is A LOT of complaints lol

title: Needs updating
comment: No back button very Laggy doesn't respond mot of the time

title: Works like it should
comment: It's up to the local council how quickly they respond!

title: Brilliant idea,  poorly implemented
comment: The idea is great and the website works great. However, the app will not display a map of my area (Northern Ireland). I believe using Open Street Map would be of huge benefit to both projects. If your app could be used to submit OSM map notes it could be adopted as a useful tool with OSM mapper's who are very good at capturing real time data.

title: Good but annoying
comment: Good app which does what it says on the tin. I would like to see my open reports as like the website. Its also very annoying when you navigate to the home page and it keeps trying to locate you.

title: Confusing navigation
comment: The app works and could be so much better. The navigation is confusing and the app will not exit and has to be manually killed. Good effort nevertheless.

title: Genius
comment: I'm in the top ten in my city apparently got so much fixed without having to wait hold to be told I've called the wrong department when reception put me through there in the first place

title: Slow
comment: The maps move really slowly and load slowly, nexus 4 5.0 lollipop. Also maybe integration with google maps instead?
Scrolling in the map is very slow, would be useful if you could also see issues in your area like on the website.

title: The app itself needs a little fixing.
comment: When you click on the details of a report, how do you get back to the main screen? I've mashed the back button and everything else. I have to fully quit the app to go back. Not good when you're making sure that you're not double reporting a problem.
Better than old app but map lags on Note 4

title: Good app
comment: Useful app, just report the problem then you'll be contacted later. Rather call and wait for hours.

title: Nice app
comment: Used this app this morning, received an email within an hour from my local council (Gwynedd, Wales) and had the Street Enforcement officer round within a couple of hours! Result.

title: Was great now rubbish
comment: No way to see previous reports or others.  Completely useless for anything other than new reports

title: Did not work
comment: Would not work in my area

title: Good to have as app
comment: Use the website regular so good to see as an app, will test it out soon, initial impressions look good.

title: Last update?
comment: This was a great app....  Until the last update.  I now can't see the maps, just brown blocked squares on the screen.  Worked perfectly for months before this.   Hope it can be fixed soon!

title: Functionality great, but misses features
comment: While I like the app and its functionality there two things missing in my opinion:  1) easy password reset option. There is non at the moment. 2) easy manageable lists of reported issues

title: Very useful
comment: Quite good interface_spot a problem, login through app,  allow app to locate place,  take photograph. Transmit to appropriate local government department.

title: Great app
comment: Needs a "forgotten username/password" field, somewhere, as it's been a while, so I've forgotten mine (new phones, etc). Trying to get that back is seemingly impossible... Will have to create a new user... Still love this, though.

title: Great app
comment: Got to love this app does exactly what it says on the tin
Doesnt work

title: Won't work
comment: Won't find location either manual or automatic!
Obviously a work in progress. Be better when you can do everything via the app, especially not having to click the link in your email, how about using a captcha?

title: Good but not perfect
comment: Good for reporting, bad for updating your report as you are directed to the website and have to log in again. Halfway there.

title: Ok
comment: Needs some work
Works with no signal too

title: Works
comment: But graphics buggy on S4. Thanks for building all the same!
Great app works well

title: Needs a little polish
comment: ...but does the job OK. Keep up the good work.
